food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I grow on trees!
💛 My peel is the color of the sun.
💪 I'm a good source of potassium.

food.question: I am round and red, and grow on a plant. You can make sauce with me! What am I?

hints.text: ❤️ Some people put me in salads!
🌱 I grow in a garden.
🍕 I am a key ingredient for pizza sauce

food.question: I am crunchy and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable
🐰 Bugs Bunny's favorite snack!
🌱 I can be purple too!

food.question: I am white and cold, and I am very sweet. You need a spoon to eat me! What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am best served cold!
🍦 I come in many flavors.
🥄 You often eat me in a bowl or a cone.

food.question: I am a fruit, often green or red, and you bite into me. An evil queen once used me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White ate me!
🍏 I keep the doctor away.
🐛 Sometimes I have a worm inside.

food.question: I am long and white or yellow, and you can make fries out of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍟 I am delicious when fried.
🥔 I grow under the ground.
🌎 I am a staple food in many countries.

food.question: I am white and come from a hen. You can scramble or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍳 I am often eaten for breakfast.
🐔 A chicken lays me.
🥚 I can be cooked in many ways.

food.question: I am made from milk and can be hard or soft. Mice like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧀 I am often yellow or white.
🐄 I'm a dairy product.
🥪 I am often put on sandwiches.

food.question: I am a fruit that grows in bunches and can be green, red, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I am used to make juice and wine.
🌱 I grow on vines.
🧺 You can pick me in a vineyard.

food.question: I am a grain that can be ground into flour. You can make bread and cookies with me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I am often grown in fields.
🍞 I am a source of carbohydrates.
🍪 I'm a key ingredient in baked goods.

bug.question: I have wings and love flowers. I make yummy honey. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I buzz around collecting nectar.
🍯 People like to eat what I make.
🐝 My name sounds like 'be'.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground, and I'm very strong. I carry crumbs back home. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am small but can lift heavy things.
🧺 I work with lots of my friends.
🐜 You might see me at a picnic.

bug.question: I have many legs and spin a web. I catch food in my sticky home. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I use silk to build my home.
🕷️ I have more than six legs.
🦗 I eat insects caught in my trap.

bug.question: I hop and jump with strong back legs, and I love to eat green leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm usually green.
🎼 I make a chirping sound.
🤸 I am good at leaping high.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar and then go into a chrysalis. When I come out, I have beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I go through a big change.
🌈 My wings have many colors.
🦋 I fly from flower to flower.

bug.question: I am small and red with black spots. People say I bring good luck. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐞 My spots help me hide.
🍀 Some people think I bring good fortune.
⚫ I have a dome-shaped body.

bug.question: I am a beetle that glows in the dark. You can see me twinkling at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I light up the night sky.
🔦 I make my own light.
🪲 I am a type of beetle.

bug.question: I have long, skinny legs and look like a stick. I blend in with the trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am very good at camouflage.
🌿 I try to look like a part of a tree.
🚶 I am long and thin.

bug.question: I have a long body and many legs. I crawl quickly and can sometimes bite. What am I?

hints.text: 👣 I have lots of legs!
🏡 I like to hide in dark places.
💯 My name means 'hundred legs' in Latin.

bug.question: I am a small insect that likes to drink blood. I can be very itchy when I bite. What am I?

hints.text: 🦟 I fly and make a buzzing sound.
💉 I can leave a bump on your skin.
🌃 I am usually found at dusk or night.
